posts.title: Becoming A Developer In 2020
posts.description: Becoming a web or software developer in 2020 is one of the best decisions you'll make this year. In this article we're going to talk about why.

posts.title: Getting Started in Development
posts.description: There are a lot of misconceptions on how and where to start in web development. I'll share with you some helpful information on how to get started from a few different angles.

posts.title: What Are Your Goals
posts.description: I've gotten some great advice from many of my mentors about setting goals for what you want to achieve. Lets discuss goal setting and how it can help all of us become succussful.

posts.title: Organizing And Working Toward Your Goals
posts.description: We know that setting goals is important, lets deconstruct how to pragmatically go from identifying and setting goals, to making them a reality.

posts.title: The ABC Method
posts.description: TWhether your a beginner or someone with a few years of experience in the industry as a developer, in this article; we're going to discuss why you shouldn't neglect your ABC's.
